Posts.Content: Hi, I too am waiting for results. I had no symptoms and my lump was found as I was experiencing real pain I’m my other Breast. I was quickly taken in for an ultrasound after my mammogram as the doctor had spotted 2’cysts and a more significant lump on my other breast. I had a core biopsy 10 minutes later of which I will get the results on Thursday. The waiting is such a struggle I am keeping my mind positive that it is benign but the thought of C just always stays in the background of your mind.Â
Posts.Title: Do docs play down cancer until they get biopsy results or can they...
